nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure this is going to work. If we merge it to master, then builds of the release branches are not going to have this change. Instead, for each for which you want snapshots from, we need to change .travis.yml.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]\.[0-9]/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)

nodes.bodyText: Yes, this change targetting master branch is really for the future releases, i.e. when we have cut branch for r0.8 and we can have 0.8.1 snapshot versions. I'm not sure if it should be cherry-picked to r0.7 branch because it is now code freeze for release candidate.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]\.[0-9]/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)

nodes.bodyText: Nothing will get cherrypicked in 0.7.1 at this point unless it's a critical bug. RC0 went out on Wednesday and it's about to be promoted to a full release in the next couple of days.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]\.[0-9]/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)

nodes.bodyText: That's fine. If this goes into master, the future release branches will be cut with this change, then this will still benefit the releases after 0.8 in the future.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]\.[0-9]/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)

nodes.bodyText: Is this regex going to fail if we ever have multiple digits per version? E.g., r0.10 or r.10.0. I think it will match the former, but not the latter. Not that we are any close to such an example... :-)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]\.[0-9]/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)

nodes.bodyText: Yes, that's right. I only considered single digit, I will make the change to /^r[0-9]*\.[0-9]*/.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]\.[0-9]/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)

nodes.bodyText: It should be + , not * as we want at least one digit.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]*\.[0-9]*/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)

@@ -34,7 +34,7 @@ jobs:
       script: ./gradlew javadocs
 
     - stage: snapshot
-      if: branch = master AND NOT (type = pull_request)
+      if: (branch = master OR branch =~ /^r[0-9]*\.[0-9]*/) AND NOT (type = pull_request)
